1.0.name: wordpress/pixel-perfect
1.0.description: Pixel Perfect plugin makes it easier to develop Wordpress sites. Use it to overlay the page you are working on with design image to achieve pixel perfect layout when coding. You can specify opacity of the overlay, height of the overlay, which page to display it on and activate/deactivate it keeping all your settings. You can also turn it on/off when developing the site by clicking on the bulb in the right top corner.
